statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSIdentityCenterInstance) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalDeleted
MATCH (n:AWSSSOUser) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalDeleted
MATCH (:AWSSSOUser)<-[r:CAN_ASSUME_IDENTITY]-(:OktaUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalDeleted
MATCH (:AWSRole)-[r:ALLOWED_BY]->(:AWSSSOUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalDeleted
MATCH (n:AWSPermissionSet) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalDeleted
MATCH (:AWSPermissionSet)-[r:ASSIGNED_TO_ROLE]->(:AWSRole) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalDeleted

name: cleanup AWS Identity Center Instances and Related Data
